description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
    
    Enhancements
   DIAGRAMNET-50555-Can't retrieve connections from VSS stencil file  
   DIAGRAMNET-50699-Support loading comment for vsd file

    Bugs    
   DIAGRAMNET-50340-VSDX to PDF conversion, the arrows of dynamic connectors are not preserved  
   DIAGRAMNET-50341-VSDX to HTML conversion, the arrows of dynamic connectors are not preserved  
   DIAGRAMNET-50346-VSDX to PDF conversion, incorrect sequence of line breaks in the text items
   DIAGRAMNET-50368-VSDX to PDF conversion, red color text items are misplaced  
   DIAGRAMNET-50369-VSDX to HTML conversion, red color text items are misplaced   
   DIAGRAMNET-50380-VDX to PNG conversion, the dynamic connectors appearance is changed
   DIAGRAMNET-50381-VDX to SVG conversion, the dynamic connectors appearance is changed 
   DIAGRAMNET-50501-VSD to PDF conversion, the shape's text is also available in shape shadow
   DIAGRAMNET-50504-VSD to PDF conversion, text items and bullets are not properly aligned
   DIAGRAMNET-50505-VSD to HTML conversion, text items and bullets are not properly aligned
   DIAGRAMNET-50506-VSD to HTML conversion, text items and bullets are not properly aligned
   DIAGRAMNET-50507-VSD to PDF conversion, text items and bullets are not properly aligned  
   DIAGRAMNET-50558-VSDX to PDF conversion, missing various shapes in the resultant PDF file 
   DIAGRAMNET-50572-VSD to PDF conversion, the dashed type lines turn into solid
   DIAGRAMNET-50714-VSD to PDF export - the background color of the checkboxes is not preserved
   DIAGRAMNET-50715-VSD to PDF export - the background color of the radio boxes is not preserved   
   DIAGRAMNET-50716-VSD to PDF export - the color of selection lists is changedup   
   DIAGRAMNET-50730-VSD to PDF export does not render letters slightly above   
   DIAGRAMNET-50731-VSD to HTML export does not render letters slightly above   
   DIAGRAMNET-50775-The text position of some items is incorrect on converting a VSDX to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-50776-Extra bullets are added for saving a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50782-Missing shapes on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50783-Missing various text items on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50784-Missing shapes on converting a VSD to HTML
   DIAGRAMNET-50785-Missing various text items on converting a VSD to HTML
   DIAGRAMNET-50786-ImageSaveOptions.Resolution property does not work as expected on exporting a VSDX to JPG
   DIAGRAMNET-50787-The position of text items is changed on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50788-The label text of buttons is missing on converting a VSD to PDF
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
